portfolio_minnesota_recreation.pageDescription: Twin Cities Recreational eCommerce Website project by Jerick Bilalat
portfolio_minnesota_recreation.projectDescription: Currently building Twin Cities Recreational website to advertise and sell their products and services online.
portfolio_minnesota_recreation.projectImgAltText: A picture of Twin Cities Recreational eCommerce Website
projectDetails: Project composes of static pages and the two seed prototype projects found below.
Continuously being develop along with the two prototypes made to show the idea behind the whole project and gather feedback from end users.
Pages are static for SEO purposes and composes of single page eCommerce application for fast product browsing and checkout and single page admin panel for product CRUD operations.
See below prototype seed projects for more technical details.

portfolio_shop.pageDescription: eCommerce SPA Prototype Project by Jerick Bilalat
portfolio_shop.projectDescription: A single page application prototype of an eCommerse site.
portfolio_shop.projectImgAltText: A picture of a prototype of eCommerce single page application
projectDetails: Prototype includes essential features of an eCommerce site such as product list browsing, guest cart, and checkout.
Front End is built with React, React-Router, Redux state management, and a Bootstrap 3 HTML template from Themeforest.
RESTful API is built with Node/Express and MongoDB/Mongoose.
Axios library is used to help with fetching resources and Web LocalStorage API is used to build the guest car functionality.
Learned at lot about the react ecosystem and how web technologies are used together for fetching resources, client and server routing, and client state management.

portfolio_admin.pageDescription: Product Management Web Application SPA Prototype Project by Jerick Bilalat
portfolio_admin.projectDescription: A prototype of a product management web application with a main feature of creating and modifying a list of products.
portfolio_admin.projectImgAltText: A picture of a prototype of Product Management Web Application single page application
projectDetails: Front End is built using React, React-Router, Redux State Management, and Material UI React Component library.
RESTful API is built with Node/Express and MongoDB/Mongoose.
Used Material UI React Component library for the sake of learning the popular libary, and the concept behind CSS-in-JS.
Applied Agile project management methology learned from Atlassian, creator of Jira, and using a Jira alternative, Pivotal Tracker, to manage the project.

portfolio_nlcf.pageDescription: Multi page website of the NLCF Church built to engage members and local community by sharing their ministries and media.
portfolio_nlcf.projectDescription: Multi page website of the NLCF Church built to engage members and local community by sharing their ministries and media.
portfolio_nlcf.projectImgAltText: A picture of NLCF Church website project
projectDetails: My very first web development project to apply knowledge after learning the fundamentals of HTML, CSS, JavaScript, reusable CSS, responsive web design, User Experience, and SEO.
Used Bourbon Framework's Grid System, jQuery for most of the UI, and Harp JS to automate the build process.
Learned the importance of understanding who is the target audience in making effective websites or applications.

portfolio_bootstrap_4_templates.pageDescription: Bootstrap 4 HMTL template project by Jerick Bilalat
portfolio_bootstrap_4_templates.projectDescription: Bootstrap 4 HTML template for a business or portfolio websites.
portfolio_bootstrap_4_templates.projectImgAltText: A picture of Bootstrap 4 HTML templates for a business and portfolio websites.
projectDetails: Built project to gain proficiency on Bootstrap 4 framework and how to design an effective homepage or landing page of a website.
The template is responsive and can be use as a template for a business or portfolio website.

portfolio_bball_app.pageDescription: Multi user web application for managing local basketball league games
portfolio_bball_app.projectDescription: Multi user web application for managing local basketball league games
portfolio_bball_app.projectImgAltText: A picture of Basketball League Web App.
projectDetails: Built with React and Material UI frameworks for the front end and Node JS for the back end API.
Implemented token based authentication where users can register and login to make authenticated requests such as creating game records.
